task.title: How to make a breakfast sandwich
task.shortdesc: Here you will learn to make a delicious breakfast sandwich as the main course of your breakfast.

context.p: This recipe will provide you with tons of nutrients and power to start the day.

You will need:
1 english muffin, cut in half
2 eggs
2-4 slices of ham
1 thick slice beefsteak tomato
2 slices of cheese (your preference)
1 tsp chives, finely chopped
salt and pepper to taste
1 tbsp olive oil or butter to saute

step.cmd: Heat a large non-stick pan over medium heat and drizzle with 1 tbsp oil.
Place your english muffin on half of the pan, cut side down.
Crack 2 eggs side by side on the other half of the pan and break the yolks with a spatula.
Once the eggs are almost cooked through, sprinkle them with salt, pepper, chives, and top with the first slice of cheese.
Once the eggs are almost cooked through, sprinkle them with salt, pepper, and chives.
Place toasted english muffins cut-side-down over the eggs and press the tops with a spatula. The cheese will allow the muffin to stick to the egg.
Place toasted english muffins cut-side-down over the eggs and press the tops with a spatula.
Flip the sandwich over so it is egg-side-up and place the ham slices and second slice of cheese on top.
Flip the sandwich over so it is egg-side-up and place the tomato slice on top.
Top the sandwich with the other half of the english muffin, and enjoy!
